name: My list of useful links and notes
body:
This is a list of links, videos and stuff:

## Talks

* Quit social media by Cal Newport: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3E7hkPZ-HTk
* On head space, by Andy Puddicombe: https://www.ted.com/talks/andy_puddicombe_all_it_takes_is_10_mindful_minutes

## Podcasts

* Tim Ferris with DHH (you might know who these two are): http://fourhourworkweek.com/2016/10/27/david-heinemeier-hansson/

## Really interesting Books
* Deep work, by Cal Newport: http://calnewport.com/books/deep-work/
* So Good They Can't Ignore You, by Cal Newport: http://calnewport.com/books/so-good/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
